## hpr1279 :: Russ Pavlicek on Xen Project

 
This show was recorded on June 1st at Texas Linux fest                                                                                                                                              
I was lucky enough to hear Russ Pavlicek talk about his Xen project and open source.                                                                                                                


https://2013.texaslinuxfest.org

https://wwww.xenproject.org
